attributes.action: Put the wheels back on the chairs in CF5 !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned of Ysgol John Bright, petition the government to demand the return of wheels to the chairs in CF5 and all computer rooms across the school! This is a real issue that needs to be addressed and is not for humour! We are unable to move around at our work stations, and unable to move away quickly if need be. Also i know people have been hurt from falling off the chair trying to move around.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
